hero.title: Let your creativity flow, take charge of your campaigns and have fun!

about.title: About
about.description: Tired of juggling different tools to organize your campaigns?
content: Discover CHARIOT, your new one-stop management tool. Experience your campaigns more intensely, thanks to the centralization of the functionalities you need to run them smoothly.

Thanks to its intuitive interface, CHARIOT lets you manage both player and non-player characters, access their stats, organize groups and battles with a simple move, optimize battles with the initiave tracker, and simply save character HP during and after a battle.

team.title: The team
description: CHARIOT is first and foremost two friends brought together by a shared passion for role-playing games. Together, we experienced the difficulties of organizing campaigns, using a variety of tools, from websites to paper and pencil. And then, one day, we made up our minds: we were going to create our own tool to facilitate the organization of our campaigns. And so CHARIOT was born, a unique management tool created by gamers, for gamers.
We hope CHARIOT will help you and please you as much as we do.

thanks.title: Thanks
content: None of this would have been possible without the talent, energy and generosity of all those who have contributed, in one way or another, to making this project a reality.
We'd like to express our deepest gratitude to everyone who supported, advised, challenged or inspired us. Every gesture, every idea, every word of encouragement counted.
We'd like to express our sincere thanks to all those involved.
